setup_script_description: sets focus on the first cell of the second row in the grid
task: navigate to last cell of row in grid
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the last cell of the current row in the grid.
output_assertions: Text of the column header ('Balance') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('$1,000,000.00') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 5, row 2) are conveyed
